output.conclusion: By the end of this course, you will have a solid understanding of Emotional AI, its applications, and ethical considerations, enabling you to contribute to its responsible development and deployment.
output.courseTitle: Emotional AI: Understanding and Building Emotionally Intelligent Systems
output.introduction: Welcome to the Emotional AI course! This course will provide you with an intermediate-level understanding of Emotional AI, covering its core concepts, applications, and ethical implications. We'll explore how AI can perceive, understand, and respond to human emotions, and how to build systems that leverage this technology responsibly.

chapters.description: What is Emotional AI? Defining the field and its goals. Overview of key technologies and approaches. Historical context and evolution of Emotional AI.
Understanding human emotions: basic emotions, complex emotions, and emotional dimensions. Psychological and neurological foundations of emotion. Cultural variations in emotional expression.
Exploring diverse applications of Emotional AI across industries. Examples include: Healthcare, Customer Service, Education, and Entertainment.

Facial expression recognition: algorithms, datasets, and challenges. Speech emotion recognition: acoustic features, models, and limitations. Text-based emotion recognition: sentiment analysis, emotion lexicons, and contextual understanding.
Designing AI systems that can perceive and interpret emotions. Integrating emotion recognition modules into larger systems. Handling noisy or ambiguous emotional data.

chapters.chapterTitle: Tools and Platforms for Emotional AI
chapters.description: Overview of available tools, libraries, and platforms for developing Emotional AI applications. Cloud-based emotion recognition services. Open-source resources and communities.
Bias and fairness in emotion recognition. Privacy concerns related to emotional data. Potential for manipulation and misuse of Emotional AI.
Guidelines for developing and deploying Emotional AI systems ethically. Ensuring transparency and accountability. Promoting user control and agency.
Emerging trends and research directions in Emotional AI. The role of Emotional AI in shaping human-computer interaction. Societal implications and future challenges.

modules.moduleTitle: Ethics and the Future of Emotional AI
